kubernetes ecosystem it kind of fits into the ethos very well and so what we did was we encoded all of our you know
kind of logic around that into this operator and for us this single operator runs on all of the clouds that we run on
it can detect what's Cloud it's running on and then do the migration and it works with highly available clusters it
will keep the cluster running while it's doing the migration and you know this is something we test in our pre-submits and
